snippet: C. C. Sabathia said he would definitely pitch as soon as he was eligible to come off the disabled list, which is Aug. 24 in Cleveland, but he also said he was worried when his left elbow stiffened up 10 days ago.
abstract: C. C. Sabathia said he would definitely pitch as soon as he was eligible to come off the disabled list, which is Aug. 24 in Cleveland, but he also said he was worried when his left elbow stiffened up 10 days ago.

headline.main: Sabathia, Not Used to Pain, Said Arm Troubles Made Him 'Really Nervous'
